feature.label: CoWolf Transformation Mapping Editor
feature.provider-name: University of Stuttgart Institute of Software Technology
feature.description: CoWolf Transformation Mapping Editor feature that contains an editor for creating Transformation Mapping files which maps SiLift recognition rules on Henshin transformation rules.
